com.conichi.sdk.utils

Class BatteryInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.conichi.sdk.utils.BatteryInfo

  • public final class BatteryInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents battery status

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int PLUGGED_UNKNOWN 
      static BatteryInfo UNKNOWN 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BatteryInfo(boolean isOkay, int plugged) 
      BatteryInfo(float percentage, int plugged) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getPercentage()
      Returns battery level Note: sometimes this data is not precise because it can be based on ACTION_BATTERY_LOW, ACTION_BATTERY_OKAY or ACTION_POWER_CONNECTED.
      int getPluggedType()
      Returns specific type of power source

      See BatteryManager and BatteryManager.BATTERY_PLUGGED_AC, BatteryManager.BATTERY_PLUGGED_USB, BatteryManager.BATTERY_PLUGGED_WIRELESS for details
      boolean isOk() 
      boolean isPlugged()
      Checks if device is connected to some power source
      boolean isPrecise()
      Checks whether percentage data is precise or not

    • Method Detail

      • getPercentage

        public float getPercentage()
        Returns battery level Note: sometimes this data is not precise because it can be based on ACTION_BATTERY_LOW, ACTION_BATTERY_OKAY or ACTION_POWER_CONNECTED. Don't forget to call isPrecise() first
        Returns:
        battery percentage (from 0 to 100)

      • isOk

        public boolean isOk()

      • isPrecise

        public boolean isPrecise()
        Checks whether percentage data is precise or not
        Returns:
        true if percentage data is precise and you can rely on it

      • isPlugged

        public boolean isPlugged()
        Checks if device is connected to some power source
        Returns:
        true if device is connected to power source, false - otherwise

      • getPluggedType

        public int getPluggedType()
        Returns specific type of power source

        See BatteryManager and BatteryManager.BATTERY_PLUGGED_AC, BatteryManager.BATTERY_PLUGGED_USB, BatteryManager.BATTERY_PLUGGED_WIRELESS for details
